channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: At Least 10 Are Killed at Ski Resort Fire in Turkey
item.description: The fire at the Grand Kartal Hotel, in a ski resort in Bolu Province, started when most of the guests were asleep. The cause of the fire was unclear.

item.title: Israeli Military Begins West Bank Raids
item.description: Amid rising tensions, Israeli troops embarked on what Israel described as a counterterrorism operation. That came hours after Jewish extremists attack...

item.title: Southport Killer Had ‘Sickening and Sustained Interest’ in Violence, U.K. Officials Say
item.description: Axel Rudakubana, who killed three young girls in the Southport attack, appeared to have no particular ideology but was obsessed by death and genocide,...

item.title: World’s largest offshore wind farm maker Orsted takes fresh $1.7 billion write-down in the U.S. as its Trump nightmare begins
item.description: Orsted's latest impairment came on the same day Trump banned new offshore wind licenses.

item.title: Trump executive order calls all federal employees back to the office 5 days a week—education and general services departments to be hit hard
item.description: Some federal departments have more than half their staff working remotely—meaning Trump's new executive order is a problem.

item.title: Elon Musk slams ‘dirty tricks’ after being accused of making fascist salutes at Trump’s inauguration celebration
item.description: Elon Musk sparked controversy with two hand gestures during his speech at Trump's inauguration celebrations.

item.title: Winter Storm Brings Snow to Texas and Louisiana

item.title: Do Americans support Trump’s Day 1 executive orders? Here’s what polling shows
item.description: Most Americans think increasing security at the U.S.-Mexico border should be at least “a moderate priority” for the federal government, and about half...

item.title: The Last Migrant Caravans Before Trump’s Inauguration
item.description: A Times photographer made two trips to southern Mexico to follow groups of migrants as they walked toward the United States.

item.title: Trump executive order pauses leasing and permitting for wind energy projects

item.title: Fire at Turkey Ski Resort Kills at Least 10
item.description: The blaze broke out overnight at a popular ski resort during a school break when many families head to the slopes.

item.title: What Trump Did on Day 1, and Biden’s Final Acts
Border Patrol Agent Is Killed in Vermont Shootin
item.description: Officials said the agent was shot on Interstate 91, which was closed for several hours near the border with Canada.
